question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. space shuttle
B. camera crane
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The space shuttle is clearly in the background, while the camera crane (implied by the person holding a camera in the foreground) is much closer to the viewer, making the shuttle further away.
